title: So are Zed, Garen, Vi, and Sona actually dead?

replies.body:
It's like a 99% chance they're alive. It was all just to boost hype for Jhin, fortunately. 

Riot's lore team is far capable enough to not make such a stupid mistake like killing off four champions to introduce one.
Rito if you dare let my beloved Zeddie die.... I`m voting for Trump.
No. At most, it's a part of Jhin's delusions. In all likelihood, it was simply a matter of marketing, as he has no interactions with Garen or Vi.
Probably Jhin shot them because they were ugly, and he wants to make them beautiful or some shit lol.
